select * from ( select so.contract_code,ss.supplier_name,qpi.pda_inspection_code,swo.work_order_code,sm.material_code,spm.product_model_name,sm.material_desc, mpm.bar_code AS pallet_code,mpm.total AS pallet_total,( select sum(qpid.inspection_quantity) from fantech_imes.qms_pda_inspection_det qpid where qpid.pda_inspection_id = qpi.pda_inspection_id ) AS 'inspection_quantity',( select sum(qpid.qualified_quantity) from fantech_imes.qms_pda_inspection_det qpid where qpid.pda_inspection_id = qpi.pda_inspection_id ) AS 'qualified_quantity',( select max(qpid.create_time) from fantech_imes.qms_pda_inspection_det qpid where qpid.pda_inspection_id = qpi.pda_inspection_id ) AS 'inspection_time', su.user_name AS surveyor,( select if(count(*)!=0,'不合格','合格') from fantech_imes.qms_pda_inspection_det qpid where qpid.pda_inspection_id = qpi.pda_inspection_id and inspection_result in (0,2) ) AS 'inspection_result', qpi.feedback_time,ssu.user_name AS 'feedback_user_name',qpi.feedback_matters from fantech_imes.qms_pda_inspection qpi left join fantech_imes.mes_package_manager mpm ON mpm.package_manager_id = qpi.package_manager_id left join fantech_imes.smt_work_order swo ON swo.work_order_id = mpm.work_order_id left join fantech_imes.smt_order so ON so.order_id = swo.order_id left join fantech_imes.smt_supplier ss ON ss.supplier_id = so.supplier_id left join fantech_imes.smt_material sm ON sm.material_id = swo.material_id left join fantech_imes.base_tab bt ON bt.material_id = sm.material_id left join fantech_imes.smt_product_model spm ON spm.product_model_id = bt.product_model_id left join ocean.sys_user su ON su.user_id = qpi.surveyor_id left join ocean.sys_user ssu ON ssu.user_id = qpi.feedback_user_id ) qa
and qa.contract_code like CONCAT('%', #{contractCode}, '%')
and qa.supplier_name like CONCAT('%', #{supplierName}, '%')
and qa.work_order_code like CONCAT('%', #{workOrderCode}, '%')
and qa.material_code like CONCAT('%', #{materialCode}, '%')
and qa.inspection_result like CONCAT('%', #{inspectionResult}, '%')
and qa.surveyor like CONCAT('%', #{surveyor}, '%')
and date_format(qa.inspection_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
order by qa.inspection_time desc
